A: 1. Grinding stone is an example of _ technology. (a) Underdeveloped (b) Developed (c) Modern
2. A blender is used for (a) Cooking (b) Food processing (c) Transportation
3. Firewood is used for (a) Cooking (b) Accommodation (c) Communication
4. An electric cooker is a form of _ technology. (a) Underdeveloped (b) Developed (c) Ancient
5. A mud house is an example of _ accommodation. (a) Developed (b) Underdeveloped (c) Modern
6. A storey building is a type of (a) Underdeveloped accommodation (b) Developed accommodation (c) Ancient accommodation
7. Well water is a _ source of water. (a) Developed (b) Underdeveloped (c) Modern
8. Pipe-borne water is a _ source of water. (a) Underdeveloped (b) Developed (c) Old
9. A horse-drawn carriage is a form of _ transportation. (a) Developed (b) Underdeveloped (c) Fast
10. An aircraft is a form of _ transportation. (a) Underdeveloped (b) Developed (c) Slow
11. A gong is used for (a) Transportation (b) Communication (c) Cooking
12. A radio is a form of _ communication. (a) Underdeveloped (b) Developed (c) Old
13. Plants are living things that can (a) Grow (b) Fly (c) Talk
14. Plants need _ to survive. (a) Fire (b) Air (c) Rocks
15. Plants have the ability to (a) Drive (b) Reproduce (c) Sing
16. Plants feed on substances in the (a) Sky (b) Soil (c) Water
17. Plants are sensitive to (a) Noise (b) Touch (c) Cold
18. Light energy _ places. (a) Darkens (b) Illuminates (c) Cools
19. Green plants use light to make their (a) Water (b) Food (c) Air
20. Any object that gives light is called a _ of light. (a) Source (b) Receiver (c) Reflector
B: 1. What is an example of underdeveloped food processing technology? _________
2. What is an example of developed cooking technology? _________
3. What is an example of underdeveloped accommodation? _________
4. What is an example of developed water source? _________
5. What is an example of developed communication technology? _________
C: 1. Name one underdeveloped technology for transportation.
2. Name one developed technology for food processing.
3. What type of technology is a mud house?
4. What type of technology is a radio?
5. Name one natural source of light.
